chargeHist.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: No contact with the victim A.M.M(person, property, residence or family). No contact with Jerome Walker or Donovan Cook. Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons. Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
NG plea entered.

9:14 AM Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Tanck-Adams in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Armonte T Cook in court, in custody.  Attorney Carl Bradford Johnson in court for Armonte T Cook. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over. 
State makes a record of counts 5-8 missing on the information as they need to be corrected, will file an amended information. 

Defense moves to modify bond to a signature bond. 
State is in agreement with a signature bond.
BTC: Motion to modify bond granted to $2000 signature bond, same conditions.
Status conference scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on April 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:38 AM Prosecuting attorney Brooke L Erickson appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Armonte T Cook appeared in court, in custody. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Defense counsel is in trial. 
BTC: Finding of good cause of waive time limits to fit with counsels schedule.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
DA AUTHORIZATION TO OBTAIN COPIES OF CERTAIN EVIDENCE
Atty Carl Johnson

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: No contact with the victim A.M.M(person, property, residence or family). No contact with Jerome Walker or Donovan Cook. Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons. Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

1:34 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary J Kotleski appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Armonte T Cook appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Juan Sebastian Ramirez for Armonte T Cook appeared by video. Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
